trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSA805_00789_SEQ_00<tab>Godwin of the Wood Wailers has a report that requires urgent delivery.
TEXT_GAIUSA805_00789_SEQ_01<tab>Godwin has entrusted you with a classified report on recent happenings in the vicinity of Fallgourd Float. Deliver it to Vortefaurt of the Twin Adder with due haste.
TEXT_GAIUSA805_00789_SEQ_02<tab>Godwin's report relayed sightings of a masked man that have stirred alarm in Fallgourd Float. Might the menacing figure described be an Ascian?
TEXT_GAIUSA805_00789_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the Fallgourd report to Vortefaurt.
TEXT_GAIUSA805_00789_GODWIN_000_000<tab>Hail, adventurer. If you would not be averse to courier duty, I have a report that must be delivered to Florentel's Spire with all haste.

TEXT_GAIUSA805_00789_GODWIN_000_001<tab>Mind you, this information is highly classified. I trust you to deliver it directly to the hands of Serpent Lieutenant Vortefaurt─<var 1A 02 /var>without<var 1A 01 /var> sneaking a peek for yourself.

TEXT_GAIUSA805_00789_VORTEFAURT_000_010<tab>These parts abound with particularly ferocious beasts. You'd do well to keep a wide berth, adventurer, lest I be left to clean your carcass off the forest floor.

TEXT_GAIUSA805_00789_VORTEFAURT_000_015<tab>A report from Godwin, you say? Very well, let us see... Traveling merchant waylaid by Qiqirn bandits, adventurer's hand bitten clean off by feral ziz, et cetera, et cetera... <sigh> The usual banalities.
TEXT_GAIUSA805_00789_VORTEFAURT_000_016<tab>Hm? What's this? Sightings of a masked man...? “No casualties yet reported, but due vigilance should be exercised.”

TEXT_GAIUSA805_00789_VORTEFAURT_000_017<tab>Troubling news, indeed─these parts are perilous enough without some masked marauder stirring up trouble. Thank you, friend. Rest assured that the Adder will be on the lookout for this interloper.
